full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer: Logistics Services for Major Events, Commemorations, and Ceremonies**
===========================================================

**Solicitation Number:** 10212690
--------------------------------------------------------

To provide logistics services for the Department of Canadian Heritage, the Government of Canada is seeking a supplier to enter into a Standing Offer arrangement. The purpose of this Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) is to identify a supplier capable of providing logistical services for major events, commemorations, and ceremonies.

**Standing Offer**
---------------

The Standing Offer arrangement will provide logistics services on an "as and when required" basis for a period of three years from the issuance of the Standing Offer. The Crown reserves the right to extend the duration by two periods of one year each.

**Services Required**
-------------------

The following services are required:

* Logistics and coordination of major events, commemorations, and ceremonies
* Planning and execution of event logistics, including venue management, transportation, and accommodations
* Coordination of event supply chain management
* Management of events' operations, including event staff and personnel
* Gathering of data and information related to events

**Eligibility Criteria**
-----------------------

The eligibility criteria for this RFSO are as follows:

* The supplier must be able to provide goods and services related to logistics;
* The supplier must have a proven track record of providing high-quality services;

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

The evaluation criteria for this RFSO are as follows:

* Suppliers will be evaluated based on their demonstrated ability to deliver effective logistics services;
* Suppliers must demonstrate their understanding of the Statement of Work (Appendix A);

**Pre-tender Enquiries**
-------------------------

All enquiries related to this RFSO must be submitted in writing to the Standing Offer Authority no later than seven calendar days before the RFSO closing date.

**Document Submission**
----------------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language (English or French). The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

### Important Dates

* Publication date: 2022-10-04
* Tender closing date: 2022-11-17 14:00:00
* Amendment date: 2022-11-10
